title: Doctor Syntax Sketching After Nature
text: The Tour of Doctor Syntax in Search of the Picturesque parodies the new fashion in eighteenth-century England for leisure travel and the quest for finding picturesque beauty in nature. Here Doctor Syntax is recorded sketching a group of braying farmyard animals with comical dignity while some fashionable observers look on.
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
